channel.title: Posts on Ben Krajacich
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ben Krajacich

item.title: Mapping Roy's Triangle
item.description:
Mapping Villages

This is a bit of code mapping each of the study villages in Mali.

Making the data frame of points:

library('ggmap')
## Loading required package: ggplot2
library('leaflet')
library('readxl')
library('htmltools')
library('crosstalk')


df <- read_xlsx("C:/OneDrive/OneDrive - National Institutes of Health/Mali 2016/Copy of Villages of triangle.xlsx")

leaflet(data=df, width="100%") %>% 
  addTiles(group = "OSM (default)") %>% 
  addProviderTiles('Esri.WorldImagery', group="ESRI.WorldImagery") %>%
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.PositronOnlyLabels", group="ESRI.WorldImagery") %>%
  addCircleMarkers(~Longitude, ~Latitude, 
             radius=~sqrt(Population)/5, 
             label = ~htmlEscape(Villages),
             labelOptions = lapply(1:nrow(df), function(x) {
               labelOptions(opacity=0.4, noHide = T,
                            direction = 'right', textOnly = TRUE)
             }),
             popup = paste("<b>Village:</b>", df$Villages, "<br>","<b>Population:</b>", df$Population),
             popupOptions = popupOptions(opacity=1, bringToTop = TRUE)) %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("OSM (default)", "ESRI.WorldImagery"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )

item.title: Mapping of Study Villages in Mali
item.description:
Mapping Villages

This is a bit of code mapping each of the study villages in Mali.

Making the data frame of points:

library('leaflet')
library('knitr')
df <- data.frame(site=c("Thierola", "Siguima", "Markabougou", "Dallowere", "Niono", 
                        "Konani", "Diessourouna", "Torodo", "Zanga", "M'Piabougou", 
                        "N'Gabakoro", "Bia", "Guemou"),
                 latitude = c(13.6586, 14.16762, 13.91442, 13.61576, 14.223473, 
                              13.9513, 13.9289, 13.0791, 13.688050, 13.599830, 
                              12.683870, 10.42, 14.5476),
                 longitude = c(-7.21471, -7.22793, -6.34382, -7.03689, -6.051057, 
                               -6.9708, -6.7094, -8.3589, -7.221029, -7.192859, 
                               -7.840419, -5.87, -9.31067))
kable(df)
site latitude longitude
Thierola 13.65860 -7.214710
Siguima 14.16762 -7.227930
Markabougou 13.91442 -6.343820
Dallowere 13.61576 -7.036890
Niono 14.22347 -6.051057
Konani 13.95130 -6.970800
Diessourouna 13.92890 -6.709400
Torodo 13.07910 -8.358900
Zanga 13.68805 -7.221029
M’Piabougou 13.59983 -7.192859
N’Gabakoro 12.68387 -7.840419
Bia 10.42000 -5.870000
Guemou 14.54760 -9.310670

Map of Village locations

leaflet(data=df) %>% 
  addTiles(group = "OSM (default)") %>% 
  addProviderTiles('Esri.WorldImagery', group="ESRI.WorldImagery") %>%
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.PositronOnlyLabels", group="ESRI.WorldImagery") %>%
  addMarkers(~longitude, ~latitude, popup = ~as.character(site)) %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("OSM (default)", "ESRI.WorldImagery"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )
